pr_title: [ML] Support mapped runtime fields for data frame analytics

timeline.message:
[ML] Support mapped runtime fields for data frame analytics

When we create the destination index for a data frame analytics job,
we merge the mappings across the source indices and copy them over
to the dest index. In order to support mapped runtime fields,
this commit adds to that merging and copying over the runtime
mappings.

Fixes #65854

timeline.bodyText:
If you flipped the order of these assertions you'd get better diagnostics if the test ever failed.  As it stands you'll just get something like expected:3 but was: 4, which isn't enough to fix it.
There are several other places in the changes where the same thing applies.
